title.rendered: Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) in Abu Dhabi, UAE

content.rendered:
Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) – Ceased operations on 9 March 2019


Al Jaber Aviation (AJA)  is a business jet airline based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. It is the new pinnacle of VIP aviation, with its offices based in Abu Dhabi.
Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) Abu Dhabi, UAE Address:
Al Bateen Airport
P.O.Box: 95220
Abu Dhabi, UAE

Phone: +971 2 6576 600 (Sales number); +971 2 6576 700 (For other enquiries); AJA Main Number: +971 2 6576 666; Toll Free: 800- AJA (252)

Email: sales@ajaprivatejets.com (Sales enquiries); ops@ajaprivatejets.com(For other enquiries)

Fax: +9712 – 657 6667

For career related queries, please contact Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) career section

Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) Official website:http://www.ajaprivatejets.com/en/home/index.aspx

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Al Jaber Aviation (AJA)

Total Fleet: 2

Airbus A318

  • Airbus A318-100

Embraer ERJ-145

  • Embraer ERJ-135

Embraer ERJ-190

  • Embraer ERJ-190

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) Abu Dhabi Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Al Jaber Aviation (AJA) Abu Dhabi: (click on the stars below)
